News.Title: Basilic Fly Studio Plans to Raise Up to Rs 100 Crore
News.Summary: Basilic Fly Studio's board has approved a plan to raise up to Rs 100 crore through various methods, including Qualified Institutional Placement (QIP) and preferential allotment.

News.Title: Basilic Fly Studio Announces 3.01 Billion Rupees Sales Pipeline
News.Summary: Basilic Fly Studio has reported a sales pipeline of 3.01 billion rupees as of January 2025. This announcement indicates a significant potential for future revenue and business growth for the company.
